comments.text:
AI breaks the fiat ponzi that Americans call capitalism.

It pops the white collar bubble and takes us back to the normal world of lot of small businesses.

Your only moat now is hyperlocal domain expertise.

Peak centralisation to rapid decentralisation.
comments.author: @RyanBansal

comments.text: Universal basic income is the only answer.
